name: Phone Number range
description: This CapacitySpecification defines the details of capacity for Phone Number ranges.

capacityCharacteristicSpecification.name: lowerNumber
capacityCharacteristicSpecification.description: the lower boundary of a block of phone numbers; phone numbers consist of a country code (cc), national destination code (ndc), subscriber number (sn), and optionally a direct dial in (ddi), all sections separated by '-'

capacityCharacteristicSpecification.name: upperNumber
capacityCharacteristicSpecification.description: the upper boundary of a block of phone numbers; phone numbers consist of a country code (cc), national destination code (ndc), subscriber number (sn), and optionally a direct dial in (ddi), all sections separated by '-'
